about.heading: I'm Omar Abdullah, a Flutter Developer, Technical blog writer and IoT Engineer.
about.description: I am in my graduation year in engineering, majoring in computer and communication from Helwan University, Egypt. I have been working with Flutter for the past 3 years and have developed multiple applications for both Android and iOS platforms. I am keenly interested in IoT Engineering and have worked on it for 5 years. I have also been writing technical blogs for the past month and have been a part of multiple technical writing communities.

projects.title: Dragat
projects.description: Comprehensive Educational Courses: Offering detailed courses that explain educational curricula in a simplified and engaging way. Interactive Interface: Enables interaction between students, teachers, and parents to enhance the learning experience.

projects.title: ElManassa
projects.description: ElManassa is an educational app that links students, teachers, and parents. Teachers create and share courses with videos and quizzes, while students can easily browse and subscribe to courses based on their grade. Parents can track their child's progress via a unique QR code, promoting better communication and collaboration.

projects.title: Egyoutfit
projects.description: EgyOutfit is a multi-vendor e-commerce app for Android and iOS, enabling clothing stores to manage products and connect with buyers. The integrated admin panel ensures efficient platform control.

projects.title: QMS (Quarantine Management System)
projects.description: This home quarantine app uses Wi-Fi, Bluetooth, and AI algorithms to track quarantine compliance. It monitors whether users are inside or outside the quarantine area via a connected bracelet and determines quarantine dates. The app was developed as part of a research paper at Helwan University's Faculty of Engineering.

projects.title: Artistic Wallpaper
projects.description: 'Artistic Wallpaper' is a visually stunning app that offers a diverse collection of high-quality wallpapers in various categories. It allows users to discover, preview, and personalize their phones with captivating backgrounds, blending functionality and aesthetics for an enhanced mobile experience.

projects.title: Robot Arm Control system
projects.description: An arduino control system for robot arm and a c# visual studio app to control it and you can save motions and remake it again with this system
